articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope fully deploys, Northrop Grumman marks sunshield success - NASASpaceFlight.com - NASASpaceflight.com

articles.content: At 18:17 UTC on January 8, 2022, the joint NASA, ESA (European Space Agency), and CSA (Canadian Space Agency) James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) successfully deployed the starboard wing of its massive… [+7282 chars]

articles.title: Europe nuclear plants 'need 500 bn euro investment by 2050': EU commissioner - Guardian
articles.description: The European Union will need to invest 500 billion euros ($568 billion) in new generation nuclear power stations from now until 2050, the bloc's internal market commissioner said in an interview published at the weekend.
